pages.text: The spell HUD and spell Radial Menu can be configured with a variety of client-side commands.$(br2)The root of all of these commands is $(l)/spellHud$()

pages.title: Basic HUD Positioning
pages.text: $(li)topLeft: Moves the HUD to the top left of the screen.$(li)bottomLeft: Moves the HUD to the bottom left of the screen.$(li)topRight: Moves the HUD to the top right of the screen.$(li)bottomRight: Moves the HUD to the bottom right of the screen.$(li)bottomMiddle: Moves the HUD to the bottom middle of the screen.$(li)reset: Resets the HUD (top left, no padding).

pages.title: HUD Padding
pages.text: $(li)x: pads the chosen 'anchor' position left-right. The direction the padding moves the HUD depends on the anchor: Left > moves left, Middle/Right > moves right$(li)y: pads the chosen 'anchor' position up-down. The direction the padding moves the HUD depends on the anchor: Top > down, Bottom > up.$(li)Example: [$(l)/spellHud topLeft 20 20$()]. This command will anchor the HUD to the top left, with 20 additional pixels of padding left and down.

pages.title: HUD Enable
pages.text: $(li)enable: enables the spell HUD.$(li)disable: Disables the spell HUD.

pages.title: Spell Radial Menu
pages.text: The spell radial menu config is controlled with the subcommand $(l)spellHudSpacing$()$(li)spacing: defines the distance from the player crosshairs that spell icons appear.$(li)reset: resets to the default spacing (80 px).

pages.title: Scrool Wheel Behavior
pages.text: The subcommand $(l)scrollChangesSpells$() configures whether or not crouching and scrolling changes spells on a scepter.$(li)enable: enables crouch-scroll spell changing.$(li)disable: disables crouch-scroll spell changing.
